name: Smoking Without Fired! (Stirling Mulvey)
description:
Smoking Without Fired is an arcade style survival game that has you, a checked out highschool teacher, trying to sneak a smoke in during class. Your challenge? To not get caught.

Left click and hold to suck back a quick cigarette, and move the mouse to keep an eye on your students. If anyone catches you in the act, it's game over.

Smoking Without Fired was made in collaboration with oJayRayo and Erin Chiverall for Trijam #114 with the theme "Smoke without fire".
